cards.name: Academy at Tolaria West
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, draw seven cards.
Whenever you roll {C}, discard your hand.

cards.name: Agyrem
cards.text:
Whenever a white creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a nonwhite creature dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you roll {C}, creatures can't attack you until a player planeswalks.

cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

cards.name: Ancient Den
cards.text:
(Ancient Den isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

cards.name: Arc Lightning
cards.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

cards.name: Arcbound Crusher
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Crusher.
Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

cards.name: Arcbound Slith
cards.text:
Whenever Arcbound Slith deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

cards.name: Arsenal Thresher
cards.text: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

cards.name: Ascendant Evincar
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
cards.flavor: His soul snared by an angel's curse, Crovax twisted heroism into its purest shadow.

cards.name: Assault
cards.text: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Balefire Liege
cards.text:
Other red creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player.
Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Bant
cards.text:
All creatures have exalted. (Whenever a creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents its controller controls.)
Whenever you roll {C}, put a divinity counter on target green, white, or blue creature. That creature has indestructible for as long as it has a divinity counter on it.

cards.name: Battery
cards.text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Battlegate Mimic
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic has base power and toughness 4/2 until end of turn and gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

cards.name: Beacon of Unrest
cards.text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

cards.name: Beast Hunt
cards.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

cards.name: Beseech the Queen
cards.text:
({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

cards.name: Blaze
cards.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Fire never dies alone.

cards.name: Bogardan Firefiend
cards.text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Bogardan Rager
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

cards.name: Boros Garrison
cards.text:
Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Boros Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
{1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Boros Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

cards.name: Boros Swiftblade
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

cards.name: Bosh, Iron Golem
cards.text:
Trample
{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.

cards.name: Branching Bolt
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.
cards.flavor:
"Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free."
—Rakka Mar

cards.name: Briarhorn
cards.text:
Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Broodstar
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

cards.name: Browbeat
cards.text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
cards.flavor:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

cards.name: Bull Cerodon
cards.text: Vigilance, haste
cards.flavor: It holds motionless vigil, watching Naya in silence through the screen of the whitecover. When it senses anything amiss, it launches forward with the uncanny sound of torn fog.

cards.name: Cabal Coffers
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.
cards.flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

cards.name: Cadaverous Knight
cards.text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
cards.flavor:
Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.
—Shadow Guild saying

cards.name: Captain's Maneuver
cards.text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.
cards.flavor: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

cards.name: Cerodon Yearling
cards.text: Vigilance, haste
cards.flavor: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

cards.name: Chaos
cards.text: Creatures can't block this turn.

cards.name: Cinder Elemental
cards.text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.

cards.name: Cliffside Market
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Cliffside Market or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange life totals with target player.
Whenever you roll {C}, exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type.

cards.name: Cone of Flame
cards.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

cards.name: Congregate
cards.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—Song of All, canto 642

cards.name: Consume Spirit
cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

cards.name: Copper Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

cards.name: Corpse Harvester
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Cranial Plating
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
{B}{B}: Attach Cranial Plating to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Cruel Revival
cards.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

cards.name: Darksteel Forge
cards.text: Artifacts you control have indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
cards.flavor:
"Did it have this shape upon Mirrodin's creation, or did some inconceivable force shape the unshapable?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher

cards.name: Death Baron
cards.text: Skeleton creatures you control and other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
cards.flavor: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

cards.name: Door to Nothingness
cards.text:
Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.
cards.flavor:
"All memory of your existence will be wiped from reality. You will die, and no one will mourn."
—Memnarch

cards.name: Double Cleave
cards.text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor: "When in doubt, kill 'em twice."

cards.name: Dregscape Zombie
cards.text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

cards.name: Duergar Hedge-Mage
cards.text:
When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact.
When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Eloren Wilds
cards.text:
Whenever a player taps a permanent for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that permanent produced.
Whenever you roll {C}, target player can't cast spells until a player planeswalks.

cards.name: Etched Oracle
cards.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

cards.name: Explosive Vegetation
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

cards.name: Fabricate
cards.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

cards.name: Feeding Grounds
cards.text:
Red spells cost {1} less to cast.
Green spells cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you roll {C}, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

cards.name: Fertilid
cards.text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches his or her library for a basic land card and puts it onto the battlefield tapped. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Festering Goblin
cards.text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

cards.name: Fields of Summer
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may gain 2 life.
Whenever you roll {C}, you may gain 10 life.

cards.name: Fires of Yavimaya
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Flamekin Harbinger
cards.text: When Flamekin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elemental card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Flametongue Kavu
cards.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Forgotten Ancient
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
cards.flavor: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

cards.name: Furnace of Rath
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
cards.flavor: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

cards.name: Glimmervoid Basin
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell with a single target, he or she copies that spell for each other spell, permanent, card not on the battlefield, and/or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of them.
Whenever you roll {C}, choose target creature. Each player except that creature's controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Glory of Warfare
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.
cards.flavor: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

cards.name: Goblin Offensive
cards.text: Put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: They certainly are.

cards.name: Gold Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

cards.name: Goldmeadow
cards.text:
Whenever a land enters the battlefield, that land's controller puts three 0/1 white Goat creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Whenever you roll {C}, put a 0/1 white Goat creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

cards.name: Great Furnace
cards.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

cards.name: Grixis
cards.text:
Blue, black, and/or red creature cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to the card's mana cost. (Pay the card's mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. The creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
Whenever you roll {C}, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Gruul Turf
cards.text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Hearthfire Hobgoblin
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor: Hobgoblins are best left alone. They sharpen their farm implements far more than is necessary for their work in the fields.

cards.name: Helldozer
cards.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

cards.name: Hideous End
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

cards.name: Hull Breach
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.
cards.flavor: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the Predator crashing into his stronghold."

cards.name: Immersturm
cards.text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.
Whenever you roll {C}, exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Incremental Blight
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.
cards.flavor: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

cards.name: Innocent Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

cards.name: Insurrection
cards.text: Untap all creatures and gain control of them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Maybe they wanted to be on the winning side for once."
—Matoc, lavamancer

cards.name: Iron Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The goblins didn't think of the myr at all, which allowed the myr to observe everywhere unhindered.

cards.name: Isle of Vesuva
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller puts a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature.
Whenever you roll {C}, destroy target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.

cards.name: Ivy Elemental
cards.text: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

cards.name: Izzet Steam Maze
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it. The player may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever you roll {C}, instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost {3} less to cast.

cards.name: Keep Watch
cards.text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
cards.flavor: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

cards.name: Keldon Champion
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.

cards.name: Kor Sanctifiers
cards.text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

cards.name: Krosa
cards.text:
All creatures get +2/+2.
Whenever you roll {C}, you may add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Leaden Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The Moriok saw the myr as fellow scavengers, never knowing just who the myr were scavenging for.

cards.name: Leechridden Swamp
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)
Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped.
{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more black permanents.

cards.name: Lethe Lake
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard.
Whenever you roll {C}, target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

cards.name: Living Hive
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

cards.name: Llanowar
cards.text:
All creatures have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."
Whenever you roll {C}, untap all creatures you control.

cards.name: Lodestone Myr
cards.text:
Trample
Tap an untapped artifact you control: Lodestone Myr gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When necessary, myr can override and control any artificial object, as can their creator.

cards.name: Loxodon Warhammer
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.
Equip {3}

cards.name: Mage Slayer
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
Equip {3}
cards.flavor:
"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
—Kresh the Bloodbraided

cards.name: Mask of Memory
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card.
Equip {1}

cards.name: Master of Etherium
cards.text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

cards.name: Menacing Ogre
cards.text:
Trample, haste
When Menacing Ogre enters the battlefield, each player secretly chooses a number. Then those numbers are revealed. Each player with the highest number loses that much life. If you are one of those players, put two +1/+1 counters on Menacing Ogre.

cards.name: Minamo
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may draw a card.
Whenever you roll {C}, each player may return a blue card from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

cards.name: Murasa
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.
Whenever you roll {C}, target land becomes a 4/4 creature that's still a land.

cards.name: Myr Enforcer
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
cards.flavor: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

cards.name: Naar Isle
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a flame counter on Naar Isle, then Naar Isle deals damage to you equal to the number of flame counters on it.
Whenever you roll {C}, Naar Isle deals 3 damage to target player.

cards.name: Naya
cards.text:
You may play any number of lands on each of your turns.
Whenever you roll {C}, target red, green, or white creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.

cards.name: Nefashu
cards.text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

cards.name: Noxious Ghoul
cards.text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

cards.name: Nuisance Engine
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Put a 0/1 colorless Pest artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: All Auriok children know the tale, "Bolgri and the Long Day of Squashing."

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Order
cards.text: Exile target attacking creature.

cards.name: Orim's Thunder
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If Orim's Thunder was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

cards.name: Otaria
cards.text:
Instant and sorcery cards in graveyards have flashback. The flashback cost is equal to the card's mana cost. (Its owner may cast the card from his or her graveyard for its mana cost. Then he or she exiles it.)
Whenever you roll {C}, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Panopticon
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Panopticon, draw a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
Whenever you roll {C}, draw a card.

cards.name: Pentad Prism
cards.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove a charge counter from Pentad Prism: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Pentavus
cards.text:
Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Put a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
{1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

cards.name: Phyrexian Arena
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

cards.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

cards.name: Pools of Becoming
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
Whenever you roll {C}, reveal the top three cards of your planar deck. Each of the revealed cards' {C} abilities triggers. Then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

cards.name: Prison Term
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.

cards.name: Profane Command
cards.text:
Choose two — 
• Target player loses X life. 
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor:
"Who says lightning never strikes twice?"
—Storm shaman

cards.name: Qumulox
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

cards.name: Rampant Growth
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

cards.name: Raven's Run
cards.text:
All creatures have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever you roll {C}, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

cards.name: Razia, Boros Archangel
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
{T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
cards.flavor: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

cards.name: Reckless Charge
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Relentless Assault
cards.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
cards.flavor: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

cards.name: Relic of Progenitus
cards.text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard.
{1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

cards.name: Rockslide Elemental
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.
cards.flavor: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

cards.name: Rolling Thunder
cards.text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

cards.name: Rorix Bladewing
cards.text: Flying, haste
cards.flavor: In the smoldering ashes of Shiv, a few dragons strive to rebuild their native land. The rest seek any opportunity to restore the broken pride of their race.

cards.name: Rotting Rats
cards.text:
When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Rumbling Slum
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.
cards.flavor: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

cards.name: Sanctum of Serra
cards.text:
When you planeswalk away from Sanctum of Serra, destroy all nonland permanents.
Whenever you roll {C}, you may have your life total become 20.

cards.name: Sarcomite Myr
cards.text:
{2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

cards.name: Savage Twister
cards.text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
cards.flavor:
"Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook! pook! pook!—before we ran for the wadi."
—Travelogue of Najat

cards.name: Sea of Sand
cards.text:
Players reveal each card they draw.
Whenever a player draws a land card, that player gains 3 life.
Whenever a player draws a nonland card, that player loses 3 life.
Whenever you roll {C}, put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Search for Tomorrow
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Seat of the Synod
cards.text:
(Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

cards.name: Serum Tank
cards.text:
Whenever Serum Tank or another artifact enters the battlefield, put a charge counter on Serum Tank.
{3}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Serum Tank: Draw a card.

cards.name: Shepherd of Rot
cards.text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

cards.name: Shiv
cards.text:
All creatures have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
Whenever you roll {C}, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Shivan Oasis
cards.text:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

cards.name: Silver Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

cards.name: Silverglade Elemental
cards.text: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Skeleton Shard
cards.text: {3}, {T} or {B}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Metal permeates the marrow of every bone in Mephidross—except one.

cards.name: Skybreen
cards.text:
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
Spells that share a card type with the top card of a library can't be cast.
Whenever you roll {C}, target player loses life equal to the number of cards in his or her hand.

cards.name: Sludge Strider
cards.text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control or another artifact you control leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

cards.name: Smokebraider
cards.text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
cards.flavor: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

cards.name: Sokenzan
cards.text:
All creatures get +1/+1 and have haste.
Whenever you roll {C}, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

cards.name: Soul Warden
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

cards.name: Soulless One
cards.text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
cards.flavor: "Surrender your soul to me."

cards.name: Stronghold Furnace
cards.text:
If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
Whenever you roll {C}, Stronghold Furnace deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Sunhome—the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

cards.name: Suntouched Myr
cards.text: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
cards.flavor: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

cards.name: Syphon Mind
cards.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

cards.name: Syphon Soul
cards.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
cards.flavor: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

cards.name: Taurean Mauler
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.
cards.flavor: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

cards.name: Tazeem
cards.text:
Creatures can't block.
Whenever you roll {C}, draw a card for each land you control.

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: The Æther Flues
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to The Æther Flues or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.
Whenever you roll {C}, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: The Dark Barony
cards.text:
Whenever a nonblack card is put into a player's graveyard from anywhere, that player loses 1 life.
Whenever you roll {C}, each opponent discards a card.

cards.name: The Eon Fog
cards.text:
Players skip their untap steps.
Whenever you roll {C}, untap all permanents you control.

cards.name: The Fourth Sphere
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a nonblack creature.
Whenever you roll {C}, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: The Great Forest
cards.text:
Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Whenever you roll {C}, creatures you control get +0/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: The Hippodrome
cards.text:
All creatures get -5/-0.
Whenever you roll {C}, you may destroy target creature if its power is 0 or less.

cards.name: The Maelstrom
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to The Maelstrom or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you revealed a card but didn't put it onto the battlefield, put it on the bottom of your library.
Whenever you roll {C}, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
cards.flavor: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

cards.name: Tornado Elemental
cards.text:
When Tornado Elemental enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.
You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

cards.name: Tree of Tales
cards.text:
(Tree of Tales isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Tel-Jilad, sanctum of the ancient trolls, keepers of the secret of Mirrodin's origin.

cards.name: Tribal Unity
cards.text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

cards.name: Turri Island
cards.text:
Creature spells cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever you roll {C}, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Undead Warchief
cards.text:
Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.
cards.flavor: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

cards.name: Undercity Reaches
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
Whenever you roll {C}, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Vault of Whispers
cards.text:
(Vault of Whispers isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Ish Sah, den of the warlord Geth, commander of countless nim.

cards.name: Vedalken Engineer
cards.text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
cards.flavor: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

cards.name: Velis Vel
cards.text:
Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Elemental Shamans and an Elemental Spirit are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
Whenever you roll {C}, target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.

cards.name: Verdant Force
cards.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Left to itself, nature overflows any container, overthrows any restriction, and overreaches any boundary.

cards.name: Whiplash Trap
cards.text:
If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Whiplash Trap's mana cost.
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Withered Wretch
cards.text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
cards.flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

cards.name: Wizard Replica
cards.text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Wizard Replica: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
cards.flavor: It responds with unnatural precision.
